author: AFP
title: Coronavirus | Japan offers $930 virus stimulus payment to all residents
description: A delivery of two masks to each household also began on Friday, although the move has been greeted with much derision online.
content:
Japan will offer a cash payment of 100,000 yen ($930) to every resident, Prime Minister Shinzo Abe announced Friday, as measures to contain the coronavirus decimate the world's third-top economy.
